sources.title: Down Argentine Way (1940)
sources.description: The story—in which an American heiress on holiday in South America falls in love with an Argentine horse breeder against the wishes of their families—takes a backseat to the spectacular location shooting and parade of extravagant musical numbers, which include the larger-than-life Carmen Miranda singing the hit “South American Way” and a showstopping dance routine by the always amazing Nicholas Brothers. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/down-argentine-way-1940/

metadata.Plot: An American girl on vacation in Argentina falls for a wealthy racehorse owner.
metadata.Writer: Darrell Ware, Karl Tunberg, Rian James
metadata.Actors: Don Ameche, Betty Grable, Carmen Miranda
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. 1 win & 3 nominations total
